actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize Federal agencies administering lands and waters for recreational and other public purposes to acquire rights-of-way essential to enjoyment and utilization of such lands and waters.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal agencies administering lands and waters for recreational and other public purposes to acquire rights-of-way where such lands and waters are not readily accessible in order to facilitate enjoyment and utilization of such lands and waters. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize Federal agencies administering lands and waters for recreational and other public purposes to acquire rights-of-way essential to enjoyment and utilization of such lands and waters.
